Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time spent on 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average time between 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Time difference between 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and the next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average resolution time of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' in cases where the next step is 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and activity Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER for cases where activity Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER occurs

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' for all cases in the event log
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time taken for a declaration to move from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Maximum time taken for a declaration to move from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The maximum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Request Payment' in cases where the declaration is approved
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average waiting time before 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' after 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average processing time of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' grouped by department
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and the end of case grouped by the last value of org:resource

Name: Cycle time of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' in the context of the entire process flow, highlighting bottlenecks.
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case
